overview:
CEO of GlobalMojo, a browser app that empowers users to raise funds for their favorite non-profits (for free) while shopping online.

Co-Founder and former CEO of UK secondary ticket marketplace GET ME IN! GET ME IN was acquired by Ticketmaster in 2008.

Founding investor and former Chairman of the Board of VivaReal Inc, a leading Brazilian real estate marketplace.

Court Appointed Special Advocate in Sonoma County. Responsible for reporting to the court every 6 mo.s on the best interest of 2 foster care children.

Vintner & Land Steward at Pangea Ranch in Sonoma County.
